effects.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  User takes 1/3 the damage it inflicts in recoil.  Has a $effect_chance% chance to paralyze the target.
effects.shortEffect: User takes 1/3 the damage inflicted in recoil.  Has a $effect_chance% chance to paralyze the target.

moveDescription:
The user electrifies itself and charges the target.
This also damages the user quite a lot. This attack
may leave the target with paralysis.
